tasks.description: Implement budget monitoring and alerting system using budgets.json configuration to track API usage costs and enforce daily spending limits
Migrate core functionality from Flask (app_old.py) to FastAPI framework as indicated by test_fastapi_migration.py presence
Set up centralized logging and monitoring across microservices (metrics-health, observability-hub) to improve system observability

plan.summary: The plan focuses on critical infrastructure improvements: implementing cost controls through budget monitoring, modernizing the framework through FastAPI migration, and enhancing system observability through centralized logging. These tasks will improve system reliability, maintainability and cost management.

original_task.prompt: Analyze this PersonaEngine project and create a 3-task plan for next development priorities
